snippet: The danger of focusing on the differences between men and women is that it assumes all women are the same....
abstract: News Analysis; discussion of differences between men and women often assumes that women are all on same page about issues impacting their gender; New York Times/CBS News poll finds biggest differences between women on political and social issues are between black and white women and between younger and older women.
lead_paragraph: The danger of focusing on the differences between men and women is that it assumes all women are the same.

headline.main: The Monster Sorority of Women Voters
